A

AccelerometerSensitivity - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit.constants
The enum of the acceleration sensor sensitivity.
acquireWakeLock() - Method in class com.sensoro.cloud.SensoroManager
Acquires the wake lock.

Prevent the device going to sleep mode so that your application can discover iBeacon when the screen is turned off.

You need call releaseWakeLock() when you are done and don't need the lock anymore.

addBroadcastKey(String) - Method in class com.sensoro.beacon.kit.SensoroBeaconManager
Add a broadcast key to decrypt a Yunzi with encryption.
addBroadcastKey(String) - Method in class com.sensoro.cloud.SensoroManager
Add a broadcast key to decrypt a Yunzi with encryption.
AdvertisingInterval - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit.constants
The advertising interval enum of the beacon.
